description: This PHP source file provides an interface for managing blocked devices in a parental control system. It includes server-side PHP code for rendering the page and client-side JavaScript for form validation, UI interaction, and AJAX submission to add devices to the blocklist.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the page with navigation title and sets focus on the input field.

methods.name: updateBlockedTimeVisibility
methods.description: Enables or disables the blocked time inputs based on whether the device is always blocked.
